Package com.composum.ai.backend.slingbase.experimential

Interface AITool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GetPageMarkdownAITool, ModifyPageReadTool, ModifyPageWriteTool, SearchPageAITool
    public interface AITool
    An action the AI can perform - likely from the sidebar chat.
    See Also:
    "https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/function-calling"

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        @Nonnull
String getName​(@Nullable
               Locale locale)
        Human readable name.

      • getDescription

String getDescription​(@Nullable
                      Locale locale)
        Human readable description.

      • getToolName

        @Nonnull
String getToolName()
        Name for the purpose of calling - must match getToolDeclaration().

      • getToolDeclaration

        @Nonnull
String getToolDeclaration()
        The description to use for the OpenAI tool call. Will be inserted into the OpenAI tools array. E.g.: 
               {
         "type": "function",
         "function": {
           "name": "get_delivery_date",
           "description": "Get the delivery date for a customer's order. Call this whenever you need to know the delivery date, for example when a customer asks 'Where is my package'",
           "parameters": {
             "type": "object",
             "properties": {
               "order_id": {
                 "type": "string",
                 "description": "The customer's order ID."
               }
             },
             "required": ["order_id"],
             "additionalProperties": false
           }
         },
         "strict": true
       }
        See Also:
        "https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference/chat/create"

      • isAllowedFor

        boolean isAllowedFor​(@Nullable
                     org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource)
        Whether the tool is enabled for the given resource.

      • execute

        @Nonnull
String execute​(@Nullable
               String arguments,
               @Nonnull
               org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource resource,
               @Nullable
               com.composum.ai.backend.base.service.chat.GPTCompletionCallback.GPTToolExecutionContext context)
        Executes the tool call and returns the result to present to the AI. Must only be called if isAllowedFor(Resource) returned true.
